columns.name: location
columns.description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

columns.name: ui_definition_uri
columns.description: The blob URI where the UI definition file is located.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: Indicates the Object ID, PUID and Application ID of entity that created the workspace.

columns.name: updated_by
columns.description: Indicates the Object ID, PUID and Application ID of entity that last updated the workspace.

columns.name: created_date_time
columns.description: Specifies the date and time when the workspace is created.

columns.name: workspace_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the databricks workspace in databricks control plane.

columns.name: workspace_url
columns.description: The workspace URL which is of the format 'adb-{workspaceId}.{random}.azuredatabricks.net'.

columns.name: storage_account_identity
columns.description: The details of Managed Identity of Storage Account
